ygData.subject: RE: Hide and Sneak skills (was Fear/Chain, is, not, che esy, and, is)
ygData.msgSnippet: I wish it were possible!  Sneak and hide are disabled until the song effect is fully gone (3 pulses after turning one off, usually). ==Maravana ==Mithaniel
ygData.messageBody:
I wish it were possible! Sneak and hide are disabled
until the song effect is fully gone (3 pulses after
turning one off, usually).

==Maravana
==Mithaniel Marr

--- "Kimes, Dean W." <Dean_Kimes@...>
wrote:
> From: "Kimes, Dean W." <Dean_Kimes@...>
>
> Haven't brought this up since I keep forgetting, but
> what about using sneak
> while invisible? Might this not let you sneak past
> those creatures we
> 'think' are seeing us invis? Maybe they are just
> hearing us and reacting to
> that? I know its logical which means its probably
> silly and wrong, but it
> sounds good.
>
> Kitasi
